item.title: About me
item.description: I grew up in a southern coastal city of China and made my way to the United States in 2010, driven by a deep desire to pursue graduate degrees in psychology and make a positive impact on the lives of children in need. In 2013, I earned my master’s degree in developmental psychology from the University of Maine. During my time at the university, I came to realize the profound influence that families have on child development.

item.title: Current Projects
item.description: If you are interested in any of the following projects or if you have your own ideas and would like to collaborate, please reach out ! EmoMine: Unraveling Emotional Dynamics in Parent-Child Interactions through Text Mining Analysis This research project aims to leverage advanced text mining techniques to delve into the intricate emotional dynamics within parent-child interactions. Emotions play a crucial role in shaping familial relationships, and understanding their nuanced expression in textual communication is paramount.

item.title: Location
item.description: Dr. Chao Liu's mailing and office addresses at Cedarville University.

item.title: Publications
item.description: Liu, C. & Waltz, K (2024). Unveiling the tapestry of mother–child interactions through text mining and sentiment analysis. International Journal of Behavioral Development. [Link] Liu, C. & Chen, C. (2024). Text mining and sentiment analysis: A new lens to explore the emotion dynamics of mother‐child interactions. Social Development. [Link] Liu, C., Younkin, F., Hardman, M., Buchanan, B., Nugent, N., Pettus, M., & Lawrence B. (2021). The Longitudinal Relations between Disciplinary Practices and Emotion Regulation in Early Years.

item.description: Schedule and location for Professor Dr von Igelfeld's office hours.

item.title: List of Irregular Verbs Across Romance Languages
item.description: This dataset contains all irregular verbs in known Romance languages.

item.title: Unusual Uses For Olive Oil
item.description: This paper reviews unusual uses for olive oil throughout the Mediterranean world. Published in the Journal of Oleic Science, 2013.

item.title: The Finer Points of Sausage Dogs
item.description: This paper studies the pulmonary efficiency of sausage dogs. Published in the Journal of Canine Science, 2004.

item.title: Lectures at the Villa of Reduced Circumstances
item.description: This graduate course presents classical results in Romance philology.

item.title: Portugese Irregular Verbs
item.description: This book discusses Portugese irregular verbs in great details.

item.title: Profanity in Early Irish
item.description: This undergraduate course discusses profanity in Early Irish.
